Articles.Content:
I've found I'm still able to use the 48-7S to launch small satellites into space. Only just though... TWR is 1.2 off the pad using 9 of them.

 So this is currently my main launch vehicle until I get round to rebuilding my larger rockets.

![1NmUP2D.png](http://i.imgur.com/1NmUP2D.png)

Falcon 9 configuration of 9 engines...

![x5HYajV.png](http://i.imgur.com/x5HYajV.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-28T21:40:28Z" title="04/28/2015 09:40  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 28, 2015</time> by Frozen\_Heart**
